scripts.build:prod: tsc src/ts/BuildLocalFileManifest.ts --outDir dist/localFileManifest && node dist/localFileManifest/BuildLocalFileManifest.js && webpack --config webpack.config.prod.js
scripts.build:dev: tsc src/ts/BuildLocalFileManifest.ts --outDir dist/localFileManifest && node dist/localFileManifest/BuildLocalFileManifest.js && webpack --config webpack.config.dev.js
scripts.start:dev: tsc src/ts/BuildLocalFileManifest.ts --outDir dist/localFileManifest && node dist/localFileManifest/BuildLocalFileManifest.js && webpack-dev-server --config webpack.config.dev.js --mode development --open
scripts.start:dev:container: tsc src/ts/BuildLocalFileManifest.ts --outDir dist/localFileManifest && node dist/localFileManifest/BuildLocalFileManifest.js && webpack-dev-server --config webpack.config.dev.js --mode development --host 0.0.0.0
